txt.en: 'I see you do not comprehend what fate awaits you.'
'Trespassers...  how dare you enter my realm unbidden!  And for what purpose?'
'Mischievous desecration?  Thieves I'll warrant!  Robbers and grave-thieves!'
'Well, we don't have to worry about that any longer, now do we?'
'I am a most hospitable host, am I not Shadow?'
'Let us see how you fare against a true nightmare!'
'Make yourselves at home.  Shadow will show you about.'
'If you require anything, feel free not to ask.'
'Impressive!  You may become a useful servant after all.'
'You dare enter my domain and challenge me?'
